data.text: Ndidzakukwezani Mulungu wanga, Mfumu yanga;
Ndidzakutamandani tsiku ndi tsiku
Yehova ndi wamkulu ndi woyenera matamando onse;
Mʼbado wina udzayamikira ntchito yanu kwa mʼbado wina;
Adzayankhula ulemerero wokongola waufumu wanu,
Iwo adzafotokoza za mphamvu ya ntchito zanu zoopsa kwambiri,
Adzakondwerera kuchuluka kwa ubwino wanu,
Yehova ndi wokoma mtima ndi wachifundo,
Yehova ndi wabwino kwa onse;
Zonse zimene munazipanga zidzakutamandani, Inu Yehova;
Iwo adzafotokoza za ulemerero wa ufumu wanu
kuti anthu onse adziwe za machitidwe anu amphamvu
Ufumu wanu ndi ufumu wamuyaya,
Yehova amagwiriziza onse amene akugwa
Maso a onse amayangʼana kwa Inu,
Mumatsekula dzanja lanu
Yehova ndi wolungama mʼnjira zake zonse,
Yehova ali pafupi ndi onse amene amamuyitana,
Iye amakwaniritsa zokhumba za iwo amene amamuopa;
Yehova amayangʼana onse amene amamukonda
Pakamwa panga padzayankhula zotamanda Yehova.
